K06vchedppu:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān /
K06vchedppu:5: anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ /
K06vchedppu:6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya /
K06vchedppu:9: śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdad bhagavān /
K06vchedppu:10: prajñapta evāsane paryaṃkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
K06vchedppu:11: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkkraman upasaṃkkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavaṃtaṃ tṛḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtvā ekāṃte nyaṣīdan /
K06vchedppu:13: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ tasyām eva pariṣadi sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
K06vchedppu:14: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:15: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisatvā mahāsatvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
K06vchedppu:16: yāvad eva tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ parittāḥ paramayā parindanayā /
K06vchedppu:20: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:21: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etat subhūte anuparigṛhītās tathāgatena bodhisatvāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
K06vchedppu:23: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye /
K06vchedppu:27: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K06vchedppu:30: iha subhūte bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitair evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /
K06vchedppu:31: yāvaṃtaḥ satvāḥ satvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītaḥ aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā upapādukā
K06vchedppu:32: vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naiva saṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ yāvat
K06vchedppu:33: satvadhātuḥ prajñapyamānaḥ prajñapyate te mayā sarve anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
K06vchedppu:34: evam aparimāṇāṃś ca satvān parinirvāpayitavyāḥ na ca kaścit satvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
K06vchedppu:36: sacet subhūte bodhisatvasya satvasaṃjñā pravartate na sa bodhisatva iti vaktavyaḥ /
K06vchedppu:38: na sa subhūte bodhisatvo vaktavyo yasya satvasaṃjñā pravarteta jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā pravarteta /
K06vchedppu:40: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvena na vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
K06vchedppu:42: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu na dharmapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
K06vchedppu:43: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvena dānaṃ dātavyam /
K06vchedppu:46: yaḥ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ apratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum /
K06vchedppu:47: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇam udgrahītum /
K06vchedppu:57: evam etat subhūte yo bodhisatvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti tasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum /
K06vchedppu:58: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ bodhisatvena dānamayaṃ puṇyakṛyāvastuṃ dānaṃ dātavyam /
K06vchedppu:60: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tathāgato lakṣaṇasaṃpadā draṣṭavyaḥ /
K06vchedppu:61: bhagavān āha na lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ /
K06vchedppu:63: yā sā tathāgatena lakṣaṇasaṃpad bhāsitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat /
K06vchedppu:64: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:69: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:70: asti bhagavan kecit satvāḥ bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:73: asti kecit satvāḥ bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:74: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyaṃty anāgate 'dhvani bodhisatvā mahāsatvā paścimāyāṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne śīlavaṃto guṇavaṃtaḥ prajñāvaṃto bhaviṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:75: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:77: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyaṃti anekabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:78: ye imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāṃtapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣv ekacittaprasādamātram api pratilapsyaṃte /
K06vchedppu:79: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena sarve te aprameyaṃ puṇyaskaṃdhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti pratigṛhīṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:81: na hi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisatvānām ātmasaṃjñā pravartsyate na satvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartsyate /
K06vchedppu:82: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartsyate nādharmasaṃjñā nāpi teṣāṃ saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartsyate /
K06vchedppu:84: sacet subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartsyate sa eva teṣām ātmagrāho bhavet /
K06vchedppu:86: saced adharmasaṃjñā pravarteta sa eva teṣām ātmagrāho bhavet /
K06vchedppu:89: na khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmodgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ /
K06vchedppu:90: tasmād idaṃ sandhāya tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyam ājānadbhiḥ dharmāḥ eva prahātavyāḥ prāg evādharmāḥ /
K06vchedppu:92: punar aparaṃ bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:93: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kācit tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā /
K06vchedppu:96: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yas tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā /
K06vchedppu:97: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yas tathāgatena deśitaḥ /
K06vchedppu:105: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ya imāṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
K06vchedppu:106: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
K06vchedppu:109: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
K06vchedppu:112: tasmāt tathāgato bhāṣate puṇyaskandhaḥ askandha iti bhagavān āha /
K06vchedppu:113: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ tṛsāhasrāmahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
K06vchedppu:114: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyad aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayed ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt
K06vchedppu:117: ato nirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K06vchedppu:120: buddhadharmāḥ buddhadhannā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāś caiva te /
K06vchedppu:123: api nu srotāpannasya evaṃ bhavati mayā srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
K06vchedppu:128: na hi sa bhagavan kiṃcid āpannaḥ /
K06vchedppu:130: na rūpam āpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān na dharmān āpannaḥ /
K06vchedppu:134: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāminaḥ evaṃ bhaven mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
K06vchedppu:139: na sakṛdāgāmino evaṃ bhavati mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
K06vchedppu:141: na hi sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvam āpannaḥ /
K06vchedppu:145: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam iti /
K06vchedppu:153: api nv arhato evaṃ bhavati mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
K06vchedppu:157: na hi bhagavan sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhan nāmaḥ /
K06vchedppu:158: saced bhagavann arhata evaṃ bhaven mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
K06vchedppu:165: na ca me bhagavann evaṃ bhavati aham asmi arhann iti /
K06vchedppu:166: sacen mama bhagavann evaṃ bhaven mayārhatvaṃ prāptam iti /
K06vchedppu:175: kaścid dharmas tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatād arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhād udgṛhītaḥ /
K06vchedppu:179: na sa kaścid dharmaḥ tathāgatena dīpaṃkarāt tathāgatād arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhād udgṛhītaḥ /
K06vchedppu:182: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisatvo evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti sa vitathaṃ vadet /
K06vchedppu:184: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhā hy ete tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
K06vchedppu:187: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ apratiṣṭhitaṃ /
K06vchedppu:191: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavet /
K06vchedppu:192: yasyaivaṃrūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tad yathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājā /
K06vchedppu:193: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet /
K06vchedppu:205: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāvaṃtyo gaṃgānadyāṃ vālukās tāvaṃtya eva gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ /
K06vchedppu:206: api nu tāsu bahvyo vālukā bhaveyuḥ /
K06vchedppu:208: tā eva tāvad bhagavan bahvyo gaṃgānadyo bhaveyuḥ prāg eva yās tāsu vālukāḥ /
K06vchedppu:210: ārocayāmi te subhūte prativedayāmi te yāvaṃtyas tāsu gaṃgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyuḥ /
K06vchedppu:211: tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ kaścid eva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt /
K06vchedppu:213: api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
K06vchedppu:216: sā strī vā puruso vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
K06vchedppu:218: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tāvaṃtyo lokadhātavaḥ saptaratnapratipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt /
K06vchedppu:219: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet /
K06vchedppu:220: ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyād aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam /
K06vchedppu:222: api tu khalu subhūte yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyād aṃtaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā sa pṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūto bhavet /
K06vchedppu:223: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya kaḥ punar vādaḥ subhūte ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyaṃti parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:224: tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharaty anyatarānyataro vā gurusthānīyaḥ /
K06vchedppu:226: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:227: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi /
K06vchedppu:228: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:235: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kaścid dharmo tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06vchedppu:238: na sa kaścid bhagavaṃ dharmo yaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06vchedppu:240: yāvataḥ subhūte tṛsāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit tad bahu bhavet /
K06vchedppu:244: pṛthivīrajaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ arajaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06vchedppu:246: yā sā lokadhātur adhātuḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
K06vchedppu:250: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dvātṛṃśadbhir mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ /
K06vchedppu:254: yāni tāni bhagavan dvātṛṃśanmahāpuraṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāny alakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni tasmād ucyaṃte dvātṛṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānīti
K06vchedppu:257: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvān parityajet /
K06vchedppu:258: yaś ceto dharmaparyāyāc catuṣpadikām api gāthām udgṛhya parebhyo deśayet /
K06vchedppu:259: ayaṃ tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyād aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam /
K06vchedppu:261: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ dharmapravegenāśrūṇi prāmuṃcat /
K06vchedppu:262: pravartayaṃ so 'śrūṇi parimārjya bhagavaṃtam etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:267: jñānam utpannaṃ na mayā jātv eva dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
K06vchedppu:269: āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe bhūtasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:271: bhūtasaṃjñā saivāsaṃjñā tasmāt tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā bhūtasaṃjñeti /
K06vchedppu:273: na mama bhagavann āścaryaṃ yad ahaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇam avakalpayāmy adhimucyāmi /
K06vchedppu:274: ye te bhagavann imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgṛhīṣyaṃti paryavāpsyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:277: api tu khalu punaḥ bhagavan na teṣām ātmasaṃjñā pravartsyate /
K06vchedppu:280: tat kasya hetoḥ yāsāv ātmasaṃjñā saivāsaṃjñā /
K06vchedppu:285: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat /
K06vchedppu:286: evam etat subhūte evam etat subhūte paramāścaryasamanvāgatās te satvā bhaviṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:287: ya iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā nottrasiṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:292: yāṃ ca tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate tām aparimāṇā buddhā bhagavaṃto bhāṣaṃte /
K06vchedppu:295: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yā tathāgatasya kṣāṃtipāramitā saivāpāramitā /
K06vchedppu:297: yadā me subhūte kaliṃgarājā aṃgapratyaṃgāny acchetsīn nāsīn me tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā satvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā na me kācit saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā babhūva /
K06vchedppu:299: sacet subhūte mama tasmin samaye ātmasamjñābhaviṣyat /
K06vchedppu:301: abhijānāmy ahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani paṃca jātiśatāni yad ahaṃ kṣāṃtivādī riṣir abhū tadāpi me nātmasaṃjñā babhūva /
K06vchedppu:302: na satvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā /
K06vchedppu:303: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam /
K06vchedppu:311: tasmād eva tathāgato bhāṣate rūpāpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam /
K06vchedppu:313: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvenaivaṃ dānaparityāgaḥ parityajyaḥ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
K06vchedppu:315: ya eva te sarvasatvāḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ta evāsatvāḥ /
K06vchedppu:316: bhūtavādī subhūte tathāgataḥ satyavādī tathāvādī tathāgato na vitathāvādī tathāgato /
K06vchedppu:318: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā na tatra satyaṃ na mṛṣā /
K06vchedppu:320: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati /
K06vchedppu:321: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣo vibhātāyāṃ rātryāṃ sūrye 'bhyudgate nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet /
K06vchedppu:322: evaṃ bodhisatvo draṣṭavyo yo vastvapatitaṃ dānaṃ parityajati /
K06vchedppu:324: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:328: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena buddhās te tathāgatena /
K06vchedppu:329: sarve te satvāḥ aprameyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:331: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā pūrvāhṇakālasamaye gaṃgānadīvālukopamān ātmabhāvān parityajet /
K06vchedppu:335: na pratikṣiped ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
K06vchedppu:344: ayaṃ ca dharmaparyāyaḥ tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ agrayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ satvānām arthāya /
K06vchedppu:350: jñātās te subhūte tathāgatena dṛṣṭās te subhūte tathāgatena /
K06vchedppu:351: sarve te satvāḥ aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:354: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmo hīnādhimuktikaiḥ śrotum /
K06vchedppu:355: nātmadṛṣṭikaiḥ na satvadṛṣṭikaiḥ na jīvadṛṣṭikaiḥ na pudgaladṛṣṭikaiḥ śakyaṃ śrotum udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
K06vchedppu:357: api tu subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyati /
K06vchedppu:359: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya vandanīyaḥ pradakṣiṇīkaraṇīyaś ca sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati /
K06vchedppu:362: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpāṃ sūtrāṃtān udgrahīsyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti paryavāpsyaṃti /
K06vchedppu:363: te paribhūtā bhaviṣyaṃti suparibhūtāś ca bhaviṣyaṃti / //
K06vchedppu:364: yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā pūrvajanmikāny aśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyaṃti
K06vchedppu:367: abhijānāmy ahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare dīpaṃkarasya
K06vchedppu:369: abhūvan ye mayā ārādhitā ārādhayetvā na virādhitā /
K06vchedppu:370: yac ca mayā subhūte buddhā bhagavaṃtaḥ ārāgitā ārāgayetvā na virāgitā yac ca carime
K06vchedppu:371: kāle paścimikāyaṃ paṃcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyām imaṃ sūtrāṃtam udgrahīṣyaṃti dhārayiṣyaṃti
K06vchedppu:373: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāṃtikād eṣa pūrvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sāhasṛtamām api /
K06vchedppu:376: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api upaniśām api na kṣamate /
K06vchedppu:378: sacet subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣet /
K06vchedppu:379: yāvaṃtaḥ te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ pratigṛhṇaṃti /
K06vchedppu:380: unmādaṃ te satvāḥ prāpnuyuḥ cittavikṣepaṃ vā gaccheyuḥ /
